name: Raidraptor - Glorious Bright
effectText: If you control a "Raidraptor" monster: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, or if you control a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster, you can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate that card's effects until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your "Raidraptor" monsters that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Raidraptor - Glorious Bright" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
